title: Seductions
description: Jason Gibson is young, handsome, and a heartthrob. He can have any woman he wants, and settling down is out of the question. When he meets Ashley Harrison, a plain-jane, he finds himself falling hard. Jason is left to question his sordid past, and why Ashley is so special to him. Cindy Horton, a gorgeous model, is less than thrilled when Jason throws her over for Ashley. She is determined to get him back, what she considers to be rightfully hers.. Just how far will Cindy go to achieve her objective? Full of twists and turns, Seductions is a cornucopia of love, sex, and betrayal.
author: Barbara  Riley
